text:
Abine.com "the online privacy company" | Full Stack (Ruby + Javascript + Native Mobile | https://www.abine.com | Boston, MA or REMOTE | Part time |

Our privacy app called "Blur" is a tracker blocker + password manager that provides unlimited aliases for your personal info so you can't be tracked across sites or spammed or billed or called without your permission. Hundreds of thousands of daily users. Looking for developers with solid experience who love the mission and care about both performance and UX and are able to start reliably part-time and see how things go from there. jobs at getabine dotcom.
